Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades, Local 874 Minute Book
International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades. Local 874
WAG.152
0.25 Linear Feet in 1 manuscript box
1971-1978 Materials are in English
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
The Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1971-1978, are expected to enter the public domain in 2099.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Materials found in repository; provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.249.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades, Local 874 Minute Book; WAG 152; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Scope and Contents
This collection contains one bound book of minutes from Local 874. Minute Book1971-19781
